title: Easiest electives for ECE 6th sem

comments.body: DIP buddy. One of the easiest electives out there

Hey there 
Take these 

E3 : Cryptography

E4 : DIP-2

This should be good
Easy tip don't take any subject that has processing in it. It will fuck up your brain.

Take MIMO in E3

and E4 opt Deep learning
DIP2 is easy but don't expect it to be as easy as DIP1
